snippet.title: [Indie Adventure RPG] Illusion Carnival - Trailer
snippet.description:
A lost soul wanders through a pop-up book-like whimsical and eerie amusement park; experience fun levels, meet unique characters, escape spirit erosion, and uncover the secrets of the park… The charming yet dark Illusion Carnival begins.

Illusion Carnival Demo version is now available on Steam! Wishlist now & have fun playing the Demo version!
Steam page link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2796340?utm_source=youtubepv1
Itch.io link:
https://kiz-qi.itch.io/illusion-carnival

!!The official release and the Demo version are of the same length, presenting only the first part of the story! The official release will be available for free. The demo version is published mainly for collecting bugs and suggestions.
